content.p: The 2015 amendment, effective July 1, 2015, substituted "instructional materials and content" for "textbooks" in subsections (a), (b), and in the undesignated paragraph of subsection (b), substituted "instructional materials and content" for "textbook" in subsection (b), paragraph (b)(2), and in the undesignated paragraph of subsection (b), substituted "instructional materials and content" for "textbook or series of textbooks" in subsection (b), substituted "Instructional materials and content" for "A textbook" in the undesignated paragraph of subsection (b), substituted "instructional materials and content were" for "textbook was" in the undesignated paragraph of subsection (b), and inserted "accessibility," at the end of the undesignated paragraph of subsection (b).
